Package com.metsci.glimpse.canvas

Heavy weight canvases on which all Glimpse rendering is performed.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FrameBufferGlimpseCanvas.GlimpseRunnable  
GlimpseCanvas A heavy weight target for Glimpse rendering.
 

Class Summary
FrameBufferGlimpseCanvas An offscreen GlimpseCanvas which renders its GlimpsePainters onto an OpenGL texture which can then be captured and displayed elsewhere.
OffscreenGlimpseCanvas Deprecated. FrameBufferGlimpseCanvas
SwingGlimpseCanvas A JPanel onto which Glimpse rendering can take place.
 

Package com.metsci.glimpse.canvas Description

Heavy weight canvases on which all Glimpse rendering is performed. Glimpse contains a GlimpseCanvas implementation for Swt and Swing as well as for various off-screen rendering targets.
